So what are the advantages and disadvantages for the environmental sensors?
Are the most important advantages is that is non intrusive so you don't have to put sensors on the person, but there are some pretty important disadvantages that make these systems.
Not preferred compared to the wearable sensors and the problem is.
Problem emerges when you have multiple users, for example in a home.
Then you don't know which person.
For example, sit on the couch or something like that.
Also the camera based approach is still complex, requires still complex compute computation which cannot be performed in real time.
And of course if you have camera you always have the user privacy issues.
Probably the biggest problem with this approach.
And on the other side, we have the wearable sensors.
